alert.note: Alert for Eastern Henrico (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 1:31PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Henrico County through 200 PM EDT... At 131 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bensley, or near Highland Springs, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Highland Springs around 200 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Richmond International, Fair Oaks, Richmond Heights, Varina, Elko, Montrose, Sandston and Glendale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
